summary: I’m a global business innovation leader with over 16 years of experience driving growth at the intersection of AI, machine learning, and emerging technologies. Currently, I serve as VP of GTM engineering and leading the team of Forward Deployed Engineers & Labs.Previously, I helped scale the AI and consulting practice at Formula.Monks to more than 150 people across four continents, achieving 12x growth and pioneering go-to-market strategies for AI in media, entertainment, gaming, and sports. My career also includes nearly eight years at Integration Consulting, where I delivered 30+ strategy, operations, and go-to-market projects for global companies such as Ambev, Johnson & Johnson, Kellogg’s, and BRF, as well as advisory work with Mandalah, Impact Hub, and others.I hold three master’s degrees in AI/ML from Oxford University, Imperial College London, and the Hebrew University of Jerusalem, and I mentor the next generation of leaders through the Oxford Artificial Intelligence Society. Passionate about blending strategy, technology, and execution, I focus on building innovative solutions that create measurable impact.
headline: AI and Machine Learning Expert | VP of GTM Engineer & Forward Deployed Engineer | 3x AI and ML Masters (Oxford, Imperial College, Hebrew Univ.) | Chief Revenue Officer & FDE

educations.degree: Executive Master in Artificial Intelligence for Business
educations.schoolName: Saïd Business School, University of Oxford

educations.degree: Master's in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence
educations.description:
Foundation to Advanced Learning: Progressed from understanding foundational concepts of ML and AI to exploring their advanced applications across industries. This included hands-on experiences with real-life data science projects, learning about effective ML methods, and delving into cutting-edge AI topics.

Interactive Learning Experience: Benefited from Imperial College's faculty insights and industry expert guidance, complemented by interactive activities and practical exercises. This approach solidified my understanding and application of ML and AI concepts to real datasets.

Practical Application: The programme culminated in a capstone project that mimicked a real-life ML competition, allowing me to apply and optimize predictive models. This hands-on experience was invaluable in demonstrating the practical implications of my learning

I worked closely with talented individuals to help them refine their business ideas and navigate their career paths, fostering a community of innovation and growth within the society.

position.title: External Sr. Data Innovation Expert
position.description:
Joined Mandalah to bring data driven perspective to the conscious innovation and purpose industry.

helped different projects on the data driven approach for decisioning and on providing simulations of the solutions

- Develop a 360 degrees mapping of the Covid-19 impact in 8 different territories

- Radical Candor Methodology for a big telecom company, involving 22 leaders .

- Development of a Pitch Deck and Strategy for a Holding of Impact Startups.

- Development of a Go-to-Market and Strategic Roadmap for a Fire Prevention in Forest Startup.

- Development of a Carbon Net Zero Strategy for Mandalah

position.title: Global VP AI solutions and GTM Engineering

position.title: Global Sr. Director of Consulting (Go to market & AI Innovation)

multiLocaleTitle.pt_BR: Global Sr. Director of Consulting (Go to market & AI Innovation)

position.description:
Responsible for the Global Go-to-Market & innovation of the consulting practice achieving with the goal of launching new services:

- Exponential Growth and Impact: Achieved 12x growth since inception, with a 20x increase in company impact.

- New methodologies Innovation: leading globally the construction of the Strategic Industries area (Media,Entertainment, Sports and Gaming)

- AI innovation: leading globally the gtm of AI services and the implementation for clients

- High Project Implementation Rate: Successfully implemented 83% of projects, demonstrating strong commitment
and execution.

- Global Expansion: Established a global consulting team of over 150 members and enhanced project integration across the globe

- Team Expansion and Innovation: Expanded the team with a hacker mentality, fostering a culture of rapid prototyping and innovation.

- Strategic DEI Initiatives: Accelerated diversity, equity, and inclusion discussions, integrating them into the core strategy for 2024 and beyond.

position.title: Consultant - business modeling & simulation (Go to Market and Operations)

multiLocaleTitle.pt_BR: Consultant - business modeling & simulation (Go to Market and Operations)

position.description:
- Development of consulting projects for large companies, focused on simulating and forecasting the future in the areas of supply chain strategy and operations, market scan, entry strategy, strategic planning, go-to-market and implementation.

- Business Model simulation for supply chain and sales, using ML and Statistics techniques and softwares

- Development of more than 30 projects, having led more than 20 projects on a daily basis in more than 10 industries (Consumer Goods, Startups, Education, Retail, etc.).

- Track record of 75% of implemented recommendations

- Go to Market Strategy Development for large companies such as Ambev, Johnson & Johnson, Kelloggs, Bimbo (Pulmann), Boehringer, Duratex Group, thinking about the recommendation and implementation of projects.

- Development of operations strategy projects (logistics, S&OP, Procurement, Customer Service) in large companies such as Ambev, Johnson & Johnson, Bosch, Ri Happy, Centaur, Netshoes, Makro, Gafisa, BRF

multiLocaleHeadline.pt: AI and Machine Learning Expert | VP of GTM Engineer & Forward Deployed Engineer | 3x AI and ML Masters (Oxford, Imperial College, Hebrew Univ.) | Chief Revenue Officer & FDE

multiLocaleSummary.pt: I’m a global business innovation leader with over 16 years of experience driving growth at the intersection of AI, machine learning, and emerging technologies. Currently, I serve as VP of GTM engineering and leading the team of Forward Deployed Engineers & Labs.Previously, I helped scale the AI and consulting practice at Formula.Monks to more than 150 people across four continents, achieving 12x growth and pioneering go-to-market strategies for AI in media, entertainment, gaming, and sports. My career also includes nearly eight years at Integration Consulting, where I delivered 30+ strategy, operations, and go-to-market projects for global companies such as Ambev, Johnson & Johnson, Kellogg’s, and BRF, as well as advisory work with Mandalah, Impact Hub, and others.I hold three master’s degrees in AI/ML from Oxford University, Imperial College London, and the Hebrew University of Jerusalem, and I mentor the next generation of leaders through the Oxford Artificial Intelligence Society. Passionate about blending strategy, technology, and execution, I focus on building innovative solutions that create measurable impact.
